80dcdcfa-5076-4a30-8d0f-5ccc080d6c1c.description: Earners of the MIP Fund Accounting Product Knowledge - Accounts Payable 1099 Administrator badge are familiar with the core concepts around verifying organization and vendor tax information, processing and filing 1099s, and preparing reports.
80dcdcfa-5076-4a30-8d0f-5ccc080d6c1c.name: MIP Fund Accounting Product Knowledge - Accounts Payable 1099 Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the following course and successfully complete related assessment.
FA261 - MIP Fund Accounting 1099 Processing
Earner must score 70% to pass quiz for the required course.

3a391df3-badf-4b19-9bca-10a9e47c0e22.description: Earners of the MIP Fund Accounting Product Knowledge – Core badge are familiar with the core concepts around managing the chart of accounts, maintaining vendors and processing accounts payable invoices, entering general ledger transactions, managing sessions, reconciling cash accounts, entering, and maintaining budgets, and creating general ledger reports.
3a391df3-badf-4b19-9bca-10a9e47c0e22.name: MIP Fund Accounting Product Knowledge – MIP Fund Accounting Core

badge_template_activities.title: Attend one of the following courses and successfully complete the related assessment.
FA101 - MIP Fund Accounting Core Workshop
Attend the FA101 workshop above OR attend the FA275 class below.
FA275 - MIP Fund Accounting Core LW
Earner must score 70% to pass quiz for each required course.

2076d54f-eaad-492d-99d7-25e2f189a83f.description: Earners of the MIP Fund Accounting Product Knowledge – Payroll Administration and Management badge are familiar with the core concepts around managing employee payroll records, managing payroll codes, processing payrolls, printing and voiding checks, and correcting payroll transactions.
